entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of rain before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
